body:
this hilarious new article from caity weaver about living like it's 1994 (

[https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/14/style/enjoy-the-silence.html](https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/14/style/enjoy-the-silence.html))

the archives of her gawker _best restaurant in new york/the world_ series (

[http://bestrestaurant.gawker.com](http://bestrestaurant.gawker.com)), which burn calories by stimulating belly laughs

sun-maid's sour watermelon flavored raisins (

[https://www.amazon.com/Sun-Maid-Sour-Strawberry-Golden-Raisins/dp/B0722PDLM4/](https://www.amazon.com/Sun-Maid-Sour-Strawberry-Golden-Raisins/dp/B0722PDLM4/)), which d spotted for me in the grocery store yesterday and which have a delightfully puckery top note

the improvisational nature of eating to clean out our fridge and freezer, which led to us having a heaping plateful of potstickers each for lunch yesterday, which is an easy delicious thing we should do intentionally rather than accidentally

with our fridge bare there's more room for cans of seltzer

having done two loads of laundry and moved some boxes d packed into the garage

how pleasantly empty parts of the house are now

the license plate of the car in front of us on the way to the grocery store, which was "LED ZEP2"

realizing that it's possible to karaoke my all-time favorite mashup (

[https://www.bratproductions.com/mixes/mashups/cure\_commodores.html](https://www.bratproductions.com/mixes/mashups/cure_commodores.html)) and doing so repeatedly in our living room

to wake and bake

to wake and bake
